snippet.title: Hiveswap Teaser Trailer
snippet.description:
Hiveswap is a multi-episodic adventure game coming in mid-2015 to PC, Mac, and Linux. When a young girl named Joey Claire discovers a mysterious teleportation machine in her attic, she’s mistakenly sucked through a portal to an alien world and must find a way home.

Sign up for updates at www.hiveswap.com
See demo reels and more at www.whatpumpkinstudios.com
